title: Turn Coordinates into Geometry using Reader Parameters

questions.question: In FME 2020 and later, attributes that match names like Y, X, Z or Latitude, Longitude, Elevation will be automatically set to x_coord, y_coord, and z_coord.
If FME does not automatically set the attribute type of the attribute holding an X or Longitude coordinate, it is not possible to manually set the type to x_coord.
